Crimes.Crime_Name: Use of a fraudulent exit visa
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Breach of natural justice due to lack of hearing transcript and improper consideration of delay
Crimes.Application_Facts: Applicant used a fraudulent exit visa, returned to Cuba, and delayed her refugee claim
Crimes.Remedy_Requested: Judicial review of Refugee Division's decision
Crimes.Court_Ruling: Lack of transcript did not affect outcome; delay was reasonably considered
Crimes.Defendant_Behavior: Used fraudulent exit visa and returned to country of origin
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Alleged fear of persecution in Cuba
Crimes.Applicable_Legislation: Refugee Protection Division Rules, Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Lack of transcript and document disclosure timing
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Actions inconsistent with credible fear of persecution
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Cited: Refugee Protection Division Rules requiring disclosure 20 days before hearings
Crimes.Application_Basis: Use of fraudulent documentation and return to Cuba
Crimes.Evidence_Assessed: Testimony and conduct related to travel and delay
Crimes.Relief_Sought: Overturn of Refugee Division's negative credibility finding
Crimes.Governing_Rule: Disclosure requirements and procedural fairness under the Rules
Crimes.Evidentiary_Deficiency: No transcript, but sufficient written record existed
Crimes.Harm_Assessment: No demonstrable harm due to procedural issues
Crimes.Cause_Description: Credibility issues regarding fear of persecution and use of fraudulent visa
Crimes.Evidence_Handling: Reliance on applicant’s own testimony and documented actions
Crimes.Evidence_Issues: Absence of audio recording or transcript
Crimes.Jurisdictional_Issue: Jurisdiction of Refugee Division over refugee claims
Crimes.Decision_Rationale: Inconsistency between claimed fear and voluntary return

Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Dispute_Type: Judicial review of refugee claim denial
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Breach of natural justice, document disclosure, and delay assessment
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant's return to Cuba undermined credibility of fear
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Delay in claiming refugee status and return to Cuba
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Refugee hearing and subsequent judicial review
Crimes.Regulation_Cited: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, sections on misrepresentation and credibility
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to explain delay and justify return to Cuba
Crimes.Authority: Refugee Division, Federal Court on review
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Procedural fairness and reasonableness of decision
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: IRPA provisions on misrepresentation and refugee eligibility
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: Dismissal of application for judicial review
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Credibility issues related to delay and return to Cuba
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Cited: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, s. 40(1)
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Adequacy of record despite no transcript
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Document disclosure and opportunity to respond assessed as fair
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Inconsistent behavior with claimed fear of persecution
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Allegation of procedural unfairness due to missing transcript
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Timeliness of document disclosure and transcript availability
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to disclose fear basis promptly
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility: Misrepresentation and lack of credible fear

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Judicial review of refugee claim decision
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Alleged breach of natural justice due to lack of hearing transcript
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Refugee claim assessment and judicial review
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Subjective fear of persecution not credible due to conduct
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Return to Cuba and delay in claim
Crimes.Regulation_Cited: IRPA provisions on misrepresentation and refugee eligibility
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to reconcile return to Cuba with fear claim
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Effect of missing transcript on fairness
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: IRPA and procedural rules for refugee hearings
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Credibility concerns about fear of persecution
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Absence of transcript but sufficient written record
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Process deemed fair despite lack of recording
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Voluntary return to Cuba contradicted fear claim
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Procedural unfairness due to missing transcript
Crimes.Omission_Type: Delayed refugee claim without adequate explanation
